data.eml:eml: Eonandeva gen. nov., a new distinctive genus from Eocene Baltic amber (Diptera: Chironomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zakrzewska, Marta, Giłka, Wojciech (2015): Eonandeva gen. nov., a new distinctive genus from Eocene Baltic amber (Diptera: Chironomidae). Zootaxa 4044 (4): 577-584, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4044.4.7
